00029 static const unsigned int kStateMask = ( GR_ALPHATEST | GR_DEPTHTEST | GR_DEPTHBIAS | GR_CULLFACE | GR_BLEND );

00043 SMaterialPassInfo::SMaterialPassInfo()
00044 : vertexColorMod( 1.0f )
00045 , vertexColorAdd( 0.0f )
00046 , minLightResponse( 0.0f )
00047 , maxLightResponse( 100.0f )
00048 , cullMode( ECM_BACK )
00049 , alphaTestMode( EAM_LESSEQUAL )
00050 , alphaTestRef( 0 )
00051 , enableState( GR_DEPTHTEST | GR_CULLFACE )
00052 , passEnable( 0 )
00053 , slopeBias( 0.0f )
00054 , constBias( 0.0f )
00055 , writeMask( GR_RGBA | GR_DEPTH )
00056 , receiveShadow( true )
00057 , castShadow( true )
00058 {
00059         shader = gGrShaderMgr->FindShader( GR_SHADER_DEFAULT_LIGHT );
00060         ambientShader = gGrShaderMgr->FindShader( GR_SHADER_DEFAULT_AMBIENT );
00061         alphaTestRef = gUExprMgr->CreateNumber( 1.0f );
00062         passEnable = gUExprMgr->CreateNumber( 1.0f );
00063 }

00080 GrMaterialPass::GrMaterialPass( unsigned int passNumber, const SMaterialPassInfo& passInfo )
00081 : _name( "" )
00082 , _userParams()
00083 , _cullMode( ECM_BACK )
00084 , _alphaTestMode( EAM_LESSEQUAL )
00085 //, _userParamCount( 0 )
00086 , _enableState( 0 )
00087 , _cachedAlphaTestRef( 0.0f )
00088 , _slopeDepthBias( 0.0f )
00089 , _constDepthBias( 0.0f )
00090 , _receiveShadow( true )
00091 , _castShadow( true )
00092 , _firstPass( false )
00093 , _writeMask( GR_DEPTH | GR_RGBA )
00094 {
00096         Init( passNumber, passInfo );
00097 }

00110 //----------------------------------------------------------
00111 void
00112 GrMaterialPass::Init( unsigned int passNumber, const SMaterialPassInfo& passInfo )
00113 {
00114         char buf[ 12 ];
00115         MemSet( buf, 0, sizeof( buf ) );
00116 
00118         _name = _itoa_s( passNumber, buf, 12, 10 );
00119 
00121         _userParams = GrMaterialUserParams();
00122         _userParams.SetShader( passInfo.shader );
00123 
00124         _ambBlendStates = passInfo.ambBlendStates;
00125         _lightBlendStates = passInfo.lightBlendStates;
00126         _cullMode = passInfo.cullMode;
00127         _alphaTestMode = passInfo.alphaTestMode;
00128         _alphaTestRef = ( passInfo.alphaTestRef != 0 ) ? passInfo.alphaTestRef : gUExprMgr->CreateNumber( 0.5f );
00129         _receiveShadow = passInfo.receiveShadow;
00130         _castShadow = passInfo.castShadow;
00131         _firstPass = ( passNumber == 0 );
00132         _shader = passInfo.shader;
00133         _ambientShader = passInfo.ambientShader;
00134         _passEnable = passInfo.passEnable;
00135 
00136         _textures = passInfo.textures;
00137 
00138         _vertexColorMod = passInfo.vertexColorMod;
00139         _vertexColorAdd = passInfo.vertexColorAdd;
00140 
00141         _minLightResponse = passInfo.minLightResponse;
00142         _maxLightResponse = passInfo.maxLightResponse;
00143 
00144         _slopeDepthBias = passInfo.slopeBias;
00145         _constDepthBias = passInfo.constBias;
00146 
00147         _writeMask = passInfo.writeMask;
00148 
00150         _enableState = passInfo.enableState & kStateMask;
00151         _disableState = ~passInfo.enableState & kStateMask;
00152 
00155         B_ASSERT( ( _enableState & _disableState ) == 0 );
00156 }

00168         return newMatPass;

00227 //----------------------------------------------------------
00228 void
00229 GrMaterialPass::SetStates( unsigned int states )
00230 {
00231         _enableState = states;
00232         _enableState &= kStateMask;
00233         _disableState = ~states;
00234         _disableState &= kStateMask;
00235 }
00236 
00237 //----------------------------------------------------------
00238 void
00239 GrMaterialPass::Update()
00240 {
00242         _userParams.Update();
00243 
00245         _textures.Update();
00246 
00248         _cachedAlphaTestRef = _alphaTestRef->GetValue();
00249         _cachedPassEnable = _passEnable->GetValue() > 0.5f;
00250 }

00253 void
00254 GrMaterialPass::ApplyAmbientBlendStates( unsigned int stateMask ) const
00255 {
00256         ApplyBlendStates( _ambBlendStates, stateMask );
00257 }

00266 //----------------------------------------------------------
00267 void
00268 GrMaterialPass::ApplyStates( unsigned int stateMask, unsigned int writeMask ) const
00269 {
00271         unsigned int enableState = _enableState & stateMask;
00272         unsigned int disableState = _disableState & stateMask;
00273         unsigned int writeState = _writeMask & writeMask;
00274 
00276         GrEnable( enableState );
00277         GrDisable( disableState );
00278 
00280         if ( ( enableState & GR_ALPHATEST ) != 0 )
00281                 GrSetAlphaTestMode( EAM_GREATER, _cachedAlphaTestRef );
00282 
00283         if ( ( enableState & GR_DEPTHBIAS ) != 0 )
00284                 GrSetDepthBias( _slopeDepthBias, _constDepthBias );
00285 
00287 //      if ( ( enableState & GR_DEPTHTEST ) != 0 )
00288 //      {
00289 //      }
00290 
00292         if ( ( enableState & GR_CULLFACE ) != 0 )
00293                 GrSetCullMode( _cullMode );
00294 
00296         GrSetWriteEnable( writeState );
00297 }
00298 
00299 //----------------------------------------------------------
00300 void
00301 GrMaterialPass::ApplyVertexParams( GrShader* shaderOverride ) const
00302 {
00304         if ( !shaderOverride )
00305                 shaderOverride = _shader;
00306         shaderOverride->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_VERTEX_COLOR_MOD, _vertexColorMod );
00307         shaderOverride->SetEngineParam4fv( GrShader::EP_VERTEX_COLOR_ADD, _vertexColorAdd );
00308 }

00310 //----------------------------------------------------------
00311 void
00312 GrMaterialPass::ApplyShader( EGRQUALITY quality ) const
00313 {
00314         _shader->Bind( quality );
00315 }

00322 //----------------------------------------------------------
00323 void
00324 GrMaterialPass::ApplyBlendStates( const SMaterialPassBlendStates& blendState, unsigned int stateMask ) const
00325 {
00327         unsigned int enableState = _enableState & stateMask;
00328         if ( ( enableState & GR_BLEND ) != 0 )
00329         {
00330                 GrSetBlendMode( blendState.srcColorBlendFactor, blendState.dstColorBlendFactor,
00331                                                 blendState.srcAlphaBlendFactor, blendState.dstAlphaBlendFactor );
00332         }
00333 }
